directions: In a glass, dissolve yeast in warm water.
Let stand about 10 minutes, until frothy.
Add yeast mixture to a bowl and stir in sugar, milk, egg, salt, and enough flour to make a soft dough.
Knead for 6 to 8 minutes on a lightly floured surface, or until smooth.
Place dough in a well oiled bowl, cover with a damp cloth, and set aside to rise.
Let it rise 1 hour, until the dough has doubled in volume.
Punch down dough, and knead in garlic. Pinch off small handfuls of dough about the size of a golf ball. Roll into balls, and place on a tray.
Cover with a towel, and allow to rise until doubled in size, about 30 minutes.
During the second rising, preheat grill to high heat.
Roll one ball of dough out into a thin circle. Lightly oil grill. Place dough on grill, and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, or until puffy and lightly browned.
Brush uncooked side with butter, and turn over. Brush cooked side with butter, and cook until browned, another 2 to 4 minutes.
Remove from grill, and continue the process until all the naan has been prepared
1853.ingredients:
1 package
                            - active dry yeast 
 4 1/2 cups
                            - bread flour 
 1/4 cup
                            - butter 
 1 whole
                            - egg beating
 2 teaspoons
                            - garlic minced
 3 tablespoons
                            - milk 
 2 teaspoons
                            - salt 
 1 cup
                            - water warm
 1/4 cup
                            - white sugar
1853.title: Naan Bread

directions: In a crock-pot add all the ingredients together except shrimp.
Cook on low for 6 hours.
Add shrimp and cook an additional 30 minutes. Serve over rice or combine with enough rice to the desired consistency.
If you can't find fresh Okra you can substitute frozen. If you can't find andouille sausage any whole link spicy sausage should work.
4756.ingredients:
1 package
                            - andouille sausage 
 1 1/2 teaspoons
                            - basil dried
 1 can
                            - beef broth 
 2 whole
                            - bell pepper chopped
 1 can
                            - cajun style tomatos 
 2 stalks
                            - celery chopped
 12 ounces
                            - chicken breast skinless
 3 cloves
                            - garlic minced in jar
 1 teaspoon
                            - hot sauce 
 1 cup
                            - okra chopped
 1 teaspoon
                            - oregano dried
 1 pound
                            - shrimp 
 2 tablespoons
                            - tomato paste 
 1 whole
                            - yellow onion chopped
4756.title: Crockpot Jambalaya

directions: Cook pasta according to directions add the 1 cup of chicken broth to the water.
Reserve 1/2 cup of the pasta cooking liquid.
Sliced the turkey sausage.
Add the olive oil, sausage, and garlic to a cooking pan. Cook till the sausage is done.
Add the spinach slowly, adding the reserved liquid to the pan to allow the spinach to wilt
Pour in the can tomatoes and add the red pepper flackes
Add the drained pasta and the sauce to a large bowl and mix
Sprinkle with the Parmesan cheese.
8800.ingredients:
1 cup
                            - chicken broth 
 1 can
                            - diced tomatos 
 1 box
                            - farfalle pasta 
 2 tablespoons
                            - garlic minced from jar
 3 tablespoons
                            - olive oil 
 3/4 cup
                            - parmesan cheese grated
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - red pepper flakes 
 1 bag
                            - spinach 
 1 package
                            - turkey sausage 
 1 whole
                            - yellow onion diced
8800.title: Spinach Sausage Farfalle Pasta
